body:
Ok, this is fairly involved courtesy of Trilinos. This adds the Nalu application from the Wind ECP. I have tried to not entirely change the way the Trilinos package works by default, but inevitably it must evolve, and I think this is the next step. This is just the beginning of numerous modifications I will likely need to make to this pull request, but this builds Nalu for me.

I don't see any way to select reviewers here, so @davydden please let me know if this will break deal ii.
title: Adding Nalu package.
